name: Kanhiya Fabrics
overview:
Established in the year 1995, at Delhi (India), we, “Shri Kanhiya Fabrics Pvt. Ltd.” is a prominent manufacturer and supplier of Embroidery Designer Suits, Designer Salwar Suits, etc.

Our Products :’ Our exclusive range includes Embroidery Suits, Embroidery Designer Suits, Cotton Embroidery Suits, Printed Embroidery Suits, Chanderi Embroidery Suits, Jorjet Embroidery Suits,Chiffon Embroidery Suits, Churidar Suits, Designer Churidar Suits, Ladies Suits, Zari Border Suits, Designer Salwar Suits, Party wear Designer Collection, etc.

Our Quality Assurance: We have employed a skilled team of professionals who help us in manufacturing and supplying superior quality range of Embroidery Designer Suits, Designer Salwar Suits, etc.

Research And Development: Our organization is outfitted with Research and Development unit that is equipped with all necessary equipment for the fabrication of our wide range of industrial products.

Client Satisfaction: Recognized as a customer-centric organization, we always give maximum emphasis on the quality of our offered range of products. Backed by skilled and experienced craftsmen, we are able to design our wide range of garments in accordance with client specifications.

Why Us ?: The key features of our organization that make us lead our competitors in the industry are superior-quality products, reasonable prices, customer-centric approach and timely delivery. Due to our ethical business policies and loyal & transparent dealings.
